definition: where the sides of the vessel curve in to form the bottom, to take in water at the bilge
details:
noun
- where the sides of the vessel curve in to form the bottom
- water accumulated in the bilge of a ship
= synonyms: bilge water
verb
- to take in water at the bilge
= example: to take in water at the bilge
= synonyms: take in water
- to cause to leak
= example: to cause to leak
